tool_description: PixelStix is a suite of technologies for locating and interacting with physical objects.
name: PixelStix
title: PixelStix

api_list.name: PixelStix Meta
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve the meta information for a given PixelStix code and any Maps/Galleries it may be associated with if the PixelStix is of type 'PREMIUM'
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/public/object_voices/BAAA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/public/object_voices/{pixelstix_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: PixelStix Map Meta
api_list.description:
A PixelStix Map is a collection of PREMIUM PixelStix that have been assigned latitude and longitude coordinates. A PREMIUM PixelStix can belong to multiple Maps and is also known as a Gallery.

This endpoint will retrieve information about your particular Map/Gallery. The name used in the endpoint is the same name that you will see in the list of galleries when using the PixelStix app.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/public/tags/tag_name/morningbreath"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/public/tags/tag_name/{pixelstix_map_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pixelstix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Last N Days Scan Counts For Tag
api_list.description: Gets the number of scans over the last N days, per day
